lead_paragraph: Chris Kreider didn't need his stick for two of his three goals Saturday night. The puck just found his body and deflected in.
snippet: Chris Kreider didn't need his stick for two of his three goals Saturday night. The puck just found his body and deflected in....

headline.main: Kreider Gets Hat Trick to Lift Rangers Past Avs 6-2
headline.print_headline: Kreider Gets Hat Trick to Lift Rangers Past Avs 6-2
